PRIVATE_KEY.description: the private key you downloaded when creating the GitHub App

APP_ID.description: the ID of your GitHub App

WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: the secret configured for your GitHub App

S3_BUCKET.description: AWS S3 bucket containing build assets

S3_SECRET_KEY.description: Access secret key for AWS S3

TWINE_USERNAME.description: Username to upload python packages to PyPI

TWINE_PASSWORD.description: Password to upload python packages to PyPI

ZEUS_API_TOKEN.description: API token to authenticate Zeus CI
